channel.title: When i try to run my server
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "0item = 85" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:366) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:62) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
this happens when i run the server wtf?

item.title: When i try to run my server
item.dc:creator: @devenb123 devenb123
item.description:
@devenb123 wrote:

i fixed that but now i have this

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:365) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:62) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
